tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE crop (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name STRING, growth_stage STRING, development_stage STRING)
CREATE TABLE growth_stage (growth_stage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, stage_name STRING, duration INT)
CREATE TABLE development_stage (dev_stage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, stage_name STRING, description STRING)
CREATE TABLE crop_stage_mapping (mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_id INT, growth_stage_id INT, development_stage_id INT)
